Description: Fragment of handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora at neck join. Clay fine ginger-buff. Rectangular stamp with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Possible pencil number Petrie Diary 1884-5 (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 122, 17? Name Thesmokritos
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0788)
